item.title: building android
item.description: Here we Go So you decided to build android yourself? Nice. First things First: requirements There are some requirements to build Android ROMs. As Stated by Google: A 64-bit environment is required for Android 2.3.x (Gingerbread) and higher versions, including the master branch. You can compile older versions on 32-bit systems. At least 250GB of free disk space to check out the code and an extra 150 GB to build it.
